title: 251- Negative Space: Logo Design with Michael Bierut
description: Logos used to be a thing people didn’t really give much thought to. But over the last decade, the volume and intensity of arguments about logos have increased substantially. A lot of this is just the internet being the internet. … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
